param.name: [$ItemCount]
param.description: Total number of items (works only in paging mode otherwise -1).

param.name: [$FilePath]
param.description: Content file path. For DMS assets it is file path relative to site and for content blocks it is quicklink.

param.name: [$ItemCount]
param.description: Total number of items (works only in paging mode otherwise -1).

param.name: [$FilePath]
param.description: Content file path. For DMS assets it is file path relative to site and for content blocks it is quicklink.

param.name: [$ItemCount]
param.description: Total number of items (works only in paging mode otherwise -1).

param.name: [$ItemCount]
param.description: Total number of items (works only in paging mode otherwise -1).

param.name: [$FilePath]
param.description: Content file path. For DMS assets it is file path relative to site and for content blocks it is quicklink.

param.name: [$CategoryId]
param.description: current category id for items being displayed.

param.name: [$ItemCount]
param.description: Total number of items (works only in paging mode otherwise -1).

param.name: [$PagingCurrentStartIndex]
param.description: Start count for the items displayed in a page's search results. Works only with taxonomy search.

param.name: [$PagingCurrentEndIndex]
param.description: End count for the items displayed in a page's search results. Works only with taxonomy search.

param.name: [$SearchText]
param.description: Displays the text for which a user is searching. Works only with taxonomy search.

param.name: [$SearchSummary]
param.description: displays a teaser that is created from information stored in the indexing service for each item in the search results. Works only with taxonomy search.

param.name: [$SearchDuration]
param.description: The amount of time, in seconds, taken for executing search. Works only with taxonomy search.

param.name: [$ContentByteSize]
param.description: Displays the content itemâ€™s size in KB. Works only with taxonomy search.

param.name: [$TemplateQuickLink]
param.description: Uses the taxonomy template as Quicklink.

param.name: [$FilePath]
param.description: Content file path. For DMS assets it is file path relative to site and for content blocks it is quicklink.

param.name: [$Type]
param.description: Content types. (Refer to Admin Manual for complete list of content types.)

param.name: [$FirstName]
param.description: Displays the First name of the member.

param.name: [$LastName]
param.description: Displays the Last name of the member.

param.name: [$DisplayName]
param.description: Displays the displayname of the member.

param.name: [$Avatar]
param.description: Displays the current profile picture or avatar of the member.

param.name: [$EmailAddress]
param.description: Displays the mail address of the member.

param.name: [$DeleteMessageLink]
param.description: Displays the Delete link for the message

param.name: [$ApproveMessageLink]
param.description: Displays the Approve link for the message used by admins

param.name: [$AddCommentBox]
param.description: Displays the Comment box and the button

param.name: [$NumberComments]
param.description: Displays the number of comments posted

param.name: [$BasketSubTotal]
param.description: The sub-total of all items for the current basket.

param.name: [$ShoppingUrl]
param.description: URL to continue shoppign, or to see details on an item.

param.name: [$JavascriptObjectID]
param.description: The unique identifier for the basket Javascript object-instance.

param.name: [$EmptyBasketFlag]
param.description: An indicator of if the current basket is empty.

param.name: [$BasketItemName]
param.description: The name of the product item.

param.name: [$BasketItemQuantity]
param.description: The quantity to purchase for this item.

param.name: [$BasketItemEarlyPrice]
param.description: The early price for this item.

param.name: [$SavedBasketID]
param.description: The ID of the saved basket.

param.name: [$SavedBasketName]
param.description: The name of the saved basket.

param.name: [$SavedBasketDateCreated]
param.description: The date that the saved basket was created.

param.name: [$SavedBasketActionText]
param.description: The text shown for each saved baskets link (open or active).

param.name: [$CurrentBasketMarkup]
param.description: The placeholder for the currently active baskets markup.

param.name: [$SavedBasketMarkup]
param.description: The placeholder for the saved baskets markup.
